alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 03 at 8:44PM EDT until July 04 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.5 to 12.9 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex, Eastern Plymouth and Barnstable Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Pockets of minor coastal flooding is expected along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. Wave action will likely cause some washover onto coastal roads around the time of high tide overnight. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Gloucester Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 15.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/12 AM 11.5/12.0 2.0/ 2.5 0.6/ 1.1 2 Minor 04/01 PM 9.9/10.4 0.4/ 0.9 0.6/ 1.1 2 None 05/01 AM 11.7/12.2 2.2/ 2.7 0.6/ 1.1 2 Minor 05/02 PM 10.2/10.7 0.7/ 1.1 0.7/ 1.1 2 None 06/02 AM 11.7/12.2 2.2/ 2.7 0.6/ 1.1 2 Minor 06/02 PM 10.2/10.7 0.7/ 1.1 0.6/ 1.1 1-2 None Merrimack River near Newburyport MA MLLW Categories - info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
